name: Dungeons & Dice (IanPerkins1)
description:
Cross between Dungeons & Dragons and Slay the Spire . Choose between 4 different characters, the knight, the mage, the berserker, and the warlock. Use dice to set your initial stats, add to your stats with each turn's roll of the dice. Each dice roll will buff your defense or attack stat. Use your stats to defeat the monsters.

you only need to use your mouse no controller or keyboard required.

 I was only able to somewhat get one level complete so not much there but I hope you enjoy what you can play.
